snippet: A federal judge has refused to allow ex-U.S. Rep. Rick Renzi remain free on bail while he appeals his convictions on public corruption and money laundering charges....

headline.print_headline: Judge Denies Ex-US Rep. Rick Renzi's Bail Request
headline.main: Judge Denies Ex-US Rep. Rick Renzi's Bail Request

lead_paragraph: A federal judge has refused to allow ex-U.S. Rep. Rick Renzi remain free on bail while he appeals his convictions on public corruption and money laundering charges.
